Description.Name: Webb Targeting Computer
Description.Details: Named for its developer, one Dr. S. P. Webb, the Webb Targeting Computer is a powerful if somewhat unusual take on a targeting and tracking system. Essentially, the Webb TC is a five-part modular weapon attachment system coordinated by the master Webb unit in the 'Mech's cockpit. The four attachments are spread across the torso and arm locations and are compatible with all known forms of 'Mech-scale weaponry. Each attachment provides a modest accuracy boost to its attached weapon while the master unit helps coordinate fire and feed the pilot accurate information about each attachment's performance. The Webb TC, while a little exotic and unusual, has seen slow acceptance among the MechWarriors of the Inner Sphere.
